name: cardistack
0:
”Alexa, ask Cardistack current price”
”Alexa, Ask Cardistack describe cardano to me”
”Alexa, ask Cardistack open main menu”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cardi stack
des:
This skill gives so general information on the Cardano blockchain. Information such as what Cardano is , the history etc.
it also provides things like Block information such as the block height and tip.
The current prices , the average transaction fees etc.

Disclaimer:
The information provided by this application pertaining to stock prices and cryptocurrency values is intended solely for educational purposes and may not reflect real-time market conditions. Users are strongly advised against utilizing this information to make investment decisions. The reliability and accuracy of real-time stock and cryptocurrency price information are not guaranteed by Cardistack.
This application serves as a general guide, and should not be the sole resource for making trading decisions. The news information displayed within the application is gathered from external sources and is subject to change without prior notice. Consequently, Cardistack disclaims all liability for any financial losses incurred from the use of this application.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
